summary: In a small Turkish town, two young tuberculous poets try to survive while publishing their poems. As they both fall in love, their life would never be the same.
cast: Kivanç Tatlitug|Mert Firat|Belçim Bilgin|Farah Zeynep Abdullah|Yilmaz Erdogan|Ahmet Mümtaz Taylan|Taner Birsel|Selman Ünlüsoy|Ipek Bilgin|Aksel Bonfil|Seher Devrim Yakut|Salih Kalyon|Miray Akay|Abdullah Arslan|Adem Atbas|Mücahit Avci|Alper Baydar|Mehmet Canbeg|Celalettin Demirel|Idil Dizdar|Anil Durgun|Selcuk Eisen|Ozan Gençel|Emin Gürsoy|Oguzhan Kocakli|Ilkyaz Kocatepe|Yesim Kuzu|Servet Pandur|Engin Senkan|Ayten Soykök|Kadir Turan|Sirincan Çakiroglu
title: Kelebegin Rüyasi
